sentences.sContent: The appellate court demanded the production of all documents.
sentences.sContent_eng: The appellate court demanded the production of all documents.
sentences.sCn: 这个受理上诉的法庭要求所有证据的出示。

sentences.sContent: Any decision by any appellate body and the reasons therefore would be communicated in writing to the appellant, together with notification of any right to further appeal.
sentences.sContent_eng: Any decision by any appellate body and the reasons therefore would be communicated in writing to the appellant, together with notification of any right to further appeal.
sentences.sCn: 任何上诉机关做出的任何决定及其理由均需以书面形式告知上诉人，并附关于进一步上诉的任何权利的通知。

remMethod.val: 和appeal (v. 上诉； 呼吁) 一起记
